name: The Future role of Artificial Intelligence in Durban
description:
• What we'll do
The event is for tech students, software developers, tech entrepreneurs and professionals who are inspired to make Durban smart city through Artificial Intelligence

Artificial Intelligence is the new technological frontier and presents a very real opportunity for Durban businesses and people, alike. The technology powers enterprise and consumer platforms, apps and interfaces that make life easier, businesses more efficient and everything more informed.

The experts will take us through the current state of AI and available cloud technologies that enable the development of AI.

• What to bring

• Important to know
Register here (60 tickets available) :
https://www.eventbrite.com/e/the-future-role-of-artificial-intelligence-in-durban-tickets-42531389531

Refreshment will be available.

name: Google Cloud Study Jam

venue.name: Durban University of Technology, Ritson Campus, Block B, DB0001

description:
Want to get started on the Google Cloud, but don't know where
to begin?
Join us for our Cloud Study Jam! Together we'll work through
three Google Cloud Platform Essentials labs, then you will get
free access to the next quest so you can finish this series of labs
at home to get a Google-hosted badge for your online profile.
You will be able to get hands-on experience with Docker,
Kubernetes and Scientific Data Processing, which will earn you
additional badges.
Join this meetup to get official Google training, a R843,76+ value, free
of charge.

name: Actions On Google-"Build Actions For Durban University of Technology Community"
description:
• What we'll do
“Build Action for your Community” is an open and modular event series designed by Google and offered to community organizer worldwide. For GDG Cloud Durban our main aim for "Build Action for your community" is to educated and inspired Durban University of Technology Department of IT (Software Development) students to designed Actions for Durban University of Technology Community. The Durban University of Technology has 6 campuses that deliver knowledge to[masked] students.
Mostly students encounter following problems on campuses:
1. Finding places (lecture venues, academic departments, students support departments). The various departments are based on different campuses.
2. Not aware of Department, Faculty and University Protocols. When student need help with a specific issue (s)he is not aware where to start or who is the relevant university staff member to contact.
GDG Cloud Durban “Build Action for your Community” will focus on learning and coding Actions on Google that address problems mentioned above.

• What to bring

• Important to know

name: Google Flutter Study Jam-Learn to develop apps for Android and iOS using flutter

venue.name: Durban University of Technology, Ritson Campus, Block B, DB0001

description:
Work with Google instructors (online) step-by-step to build a fully functional native “Unit Converter App” for both iOS and Android using Flutter
Learn how to set up your environment and start building your first Flutter application
Learn about fundamentals: UI Widgets, App State, Material Design, User Interaction and Gestures, and Packages
Learn how to structure and architect your app and use Flutter's tooling to build apps efficiently
Complete the course and get Google-offered Study Jam completion certificate and a profile badge.

name: Google Cloud Next '18 Extended - Durban

venue.name: Durban University of Technology, Ritson Campus, Block B, DB0001

description:
Join us for this year's Next Extended event, where we'll bring together cloud enthusiasts and the developer community to be a part of the Next '18 experience.

This year, we will be diving deep into cloud with technical keynotes, a hands-on TOPIC (Kubernetes, ML, or Google Cloud Certification) lab, and local speakers.

As an attendee, you'll not only be a part of our vibrant cloud community but also receive free access to Qwiklabs (R700($55)+ value)!

Get ready for the best Next Extended yet!

name: Google Cloud Study Jam

venue.name: Durban University of Technology, Ritson Campus, Block B, DB0001

description:
Want to get started on the Google Cloud, but don't know where
to begin?
Join us for our Cloud Study Jam! Together we'll work through
three Google Cloud Platform Machine learning labs, then you will get
free access to the next quest so you can finish this series of labs
at home to get a Google-hosted badge for your online profile.
You will be able to get hands-on experience on BigQuery, Cloud ML Engine, which will earn you badges.
